scripts.build: rimraf dist && ncc build src/index.ts --external fhir-package-explorer --minify --no-cache --out dist
scripts.build:test:manual: rimraf test/manual && ncc build test/manual.ts --external fhir-package-explorer --minify --no-cache --out test/manual
scripts.build:test:wip: rimraf test/wip && ncc build test/wip.ts --external fhir-package-explorer --external fs-extra --minify --no-cache --out test/wip
scripts.build:sushi: rimraf test/FsgTestPkg/dist && sushi -s test/FsgTestPkg -o test/FsgTestPkg/dist && node test/create-fsh-manifest.js && node test/install-fsh-package.js
scripts.dist-to-module: rimraf node_modules/fhir-snapshot-generator && npm run build && node test/dist-to-module.js
